title: I'm 10 and want to kill myself. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Couple of things:1) Talk to someone face to face…if not your parents, then a trusted friend and/or your church pastor or neighbor, most importantly an older person.2) Get outside and stay away from media and youtube for a while. Balance in life is important…physical excercise is very important.3) Join a youth group…which you can find at your local church or YMCA. Interact and have fun with the other kids your age.4) Go to your school counselor and ask for help there. Best to you!

It will be of a lot help to you if you talked with a psychologist or your parents about it. Believe me, they can only help you. You are young, 11 years old, life is ahead of you, no matter how bad life is now it can get a lot better.
